meanings.sent1: The eelier snake slithered through the grass.
meanings.sent2: The eelier fish moved swiftly through the water.
meanings.sent3: The eelier cat tried to mimic the movements of an eel.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as eelier as a snake in the grass.
meanings.sent5: The eelier creature moved with a graceful, serpentine motion.

meanings.sent1: The creature had an eelier appearance than any other in the sea.
meanings.sent2: The eelier tail of the fish helped it glide effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The eelier costume made him look like a mysterious sea creature.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had an eelier gaze, captivating and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The eelier shape of the submarine allowed it to move smoothly through the water.

meanings.definition: in a manner resembling an eel
meanings.sent1: She moved eelier than usual, sliding effortlessly through the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The dancer glided eelier across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: He spoke eelier than a whisper, barely audible but intriguing.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed eelier after the rain, resembling a slithering snake.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled eelier through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere.
